topic.title: Updating stuck
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: _____
  * Operating system: Win 7
  * Web browser: Tor 
  * Tor status: available
  * Opened port: yes
  * Special configuration: ____

While trying to access a site through zeronet only about half of all files get downloaded, then the download slows to a crawl and then stops completely. It tells me its still updating but its completely frozen no matter how long I wait. I am pretty sure that the files are still getting seeded too.
